title: Pixel 3 Bluetooth headphones - connects but sometimes won't play through them
content:
My Pixel 3XL will sometimes (~50% of the time) CONNECT to my bluetooth headphones no problem, but will not PLAY SOUND through them - it continues to play sound through the phone's speaker. When you click on the "phone speaker" button to try and select another device, it doesn't show it.

Troubleshooting:
The device DOES have "Media Audio" checked
The device DOES work with other phones
This problem occurs with MULTIPLE DEVICES (different bluetooth headphones)
Restarting sometimes, but does not always, fix the problem
Has been occurring on and off for about 18 months now

Please advise, very frustrating - this is only the worst of a tall stack of bugs I've experienced with my Pixel 3 XL (speakerphone mic doesn't work, wifi randomly turns off and have to restart to get it back, Chrome randomly loses internet, bluetooth randomly disables, ...) - I got a Pixel thinking it would be the smoothest/cleanest Android experience, now will never buy a Pixel again.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
